mapper.select: select pid,p_name,tid,sid,stock,photo,bid,p_describe,p_size,total_sales ,p_origin,p_weight,opening_price,selling_price,isAudit,p_status,isdelete FROM product order by selling_price ASC limit 0,8
select pid,p_name,tid,sid,stock,photo,bid,p_describe,p_size,total_sales ,p_origin,p_weight,opening_price,selling_price,isAudit,p_status,isdelete FROM product order by pid desc limit 0,8
mapper.sql: pid, p_name, tid, sid, stock, photo, bid, p_describe, p_size, total_sales, p_origin, p_weight, opening_price, selling_price, assessor_id, isAudit, audittime, p_status, pinyin, keyword, isdelete
mapper.select:

distinct
,

order by ${orderByClause}

update product
pid = #{record.pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
p_name = #{record.pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tid = #{record.tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sid = #{record.sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock = #{record.stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
photo = #{record.photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
